description:
This  vector layer shows the location  marine areas managed at a local level by the coastal communities through collaborative groups, organisations and government representatives who reside or are based within the immediate area.
The layer also shows/contains the attributes  of the  associated coastal and marine resources
keywords: Western Indian Ocean, LMMA, Africa, East Africa, Comoros, Kenya, Madagascar, Mauritius, Mayotte, Mozambique, Reunion, Seychelles, Somalia, North Africa, Southern Africa, South Africa
name: WIO Locally Managed Marine areas
